title: Gloria from Borges Lettering
content:
Our first sans serif is now available at Letterhead Fonts!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515174840im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Gloria_5904.jpg)

[http://www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/gloria.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515174840/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/gloria.php "http://www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/gloria.php")

Thanks for looking!

-Charles Borges de Oliveira

[www.borgeslettering.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515174840/http:/www.borgeslettering.com/ "www.borgeslettering.com")
author: Charles_borges_...

comments.content:
Nice font, and I like the style of the Gloria and American Radio logo.

Rudy
